name: Mr.Cat.
upgrade_notice: This release has base changes to the code. Before updating do a backup of your site and annotate your selections on MR Categories. After the update you might need to re-select your widgets' options.
author: Marcos Rego

sections.description: Mr.Cat. brings you the widget 'MR Categories'. Display categories with descriptions, media and links, in a variety of layouts with many customizable options.
sections.changelog:
0.4.3 - Changed some layout options on 'Options > Other options' to global layout options, to avoid confusion and to be more consistent with other CMS like Joomla. (Mr.Cat. only).

See the complete changelog on Github.
